column2: "Nsa yɛ ɔtwetwesifo
column3: nsadzen ma nyimpa yɛ gyigyeegye: Na obiara a ɔtɔ mu ntentan no

column2: "Ɔhen no ho hu tse dɛ awendadze a ɔropɔw: Nyia oyi no ebufuw no
"Ɔyɛ enyimnyam ma nyimpa dɛ ɔtwe noho fi manso ho: Na ɔkwasea biara dze
"Awɔwber ntsi onyihanyi nnkɔdɔw; Dɛm ntsi twaber mu ɔbɛserɛserɛ
"Nyimpa akoma mu pɔwbɔ tse dɛ esubun; Na nyia ɔwɔ ntseasee no na ɔbɔtow."
"Nyimpa pii bɔbɔ hɔnankasa hɔn ayamuyie dawur: Naaso nyimpa nokwafo dze
"Nyimpa tsenenee a ɔnam n'emudzi mu no
column3: Esiarfo nye ne mba a wodzi n'ekyir."

column2: "Ɔhen a ɔtse asɛndzii egua do no
column3: Ɔdze n'enyiwa bɔ mbusu nyina petse."

column2: "Woana botum aka dɛ
column4: Mo ho efir efi mo bɔn ho?"

column2: "Nkerii ahorow
column4: Emu ebien nyinara yɛ EWURADZE n'ekyiwadze."

column2: "Abofra mpo
"Asowa a ɔtse
column4: Emu ebien nyina so mpo EWURADZE yɛe."

column2: "Mma mmpɛ nda
"Adzegyangyan a
column4: ɔdzetɔfo na ɔse: Na sɛ otwa noho kɔ pɛ

column2: "Sika wɔ hɔ
column3: na mbota pii so: Naaso nyimdzee kasa dze

column2: "Fa nyia odzi ahɔho egyinamu no n'efuradze; Na fa nyia odzi ahɔho egyinamu si ahoba."
"Akɔhwi edziban yɛ nyimpa bi dɛw; Na n'ekyir no mbosaabo bɛhyɛ n'anomu ma."
"Tsirmpɔw biara wɔdze egyinatu si no gyinae: Na fa nyansa apam kyer ɔsa."
"Nyia okyimakyima dɛ afakɔafaba no
column3: ɔda esumasɛm edzi: Dɛm ntsi mma nnye nyia obue n'ano tɛtɛɛtɛr no ndzi afora."

column2: "Obiara a ɔdom ne na anaa n'egya no
column3: Wobodum ne kandzea wɔ sum kebii mu."

column2: "Ɔbɛhyɛ ase enya egyapadze ntsɛntsɛm dze; Naaso n'ewiei nnkɛyɛ siar."
"Mma ɔwoara nnse dɛ
"Nkerii ahorow
column3: EWURADZE n'ekyiwadze a: Na nsisi nsɛn nnye."

column2: "Nyimpa n'anamɔntu biara fir EWURADZE; Nyimpa bɛyɛ dɛn koraa atse no kwan ase?"
"Ɔyɛ efir ma nyimpa dɛ ɔbɔbɔ anohoba efuraado dɛ
column4: Na anohoba no ekyir no ansaana ɔadwendwen ho."

column2: "Ɔhen nyansafo huw emumuyɛfo do
column3: Na wɔdze ewuporow hwiir dua hɔn do."

column2: "Nyimpa no sunsum yɛ EWURADZE ne kandzea
column3: Ɔhwehwɛ yafun mu mpiatun nyinara mu."

column2: "Mbɔbɔrhu na nokwar kora ɔhen do: Na mbɔbɔrhu suo n'ahengua mu gyina."
"Mberantsɛ enyimnyam nye hɔn ahoɔdzen: Na nkɔdaa hɔn ahoɔfɛw nye hɔn tsigon."
"Mbaa a opirapira no
column3: ɔhohor mbusu: Na ɔhwe bɔ wura nyimpa mu siesie no."
